author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Part of #25090
Made `TriggerMatchProducer` and `JetHTJetPlusHOFilter` stream modules.
Profited of this to remove `TriggerMatchProducer.icc` file and include it in the class header.

#### PR validation:

It compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport needed.
title: make TriggerMatchProducer and JetHTJetPlusHOFilter stream modules
